Entries.denver_werewolf: %Denver is feeling a little out of sorts... it's probably best to leave him alone.
Entries.denver_guitar: %Denver is practicing the guitar. Maybe you should come back later?

Entries.Denver: Do we get to, like... eat the eggs after this?#$e#No? Sorry, I'm from the city, we don't do stuff like this.
Entries.Denver_spouse: I know you'll win the egg hunt this year, babe!$1

Entries.Denver: Hrrngh... I'm not really good at dancing...$2
Entries.Denver_spouse: I guess if you want to dance, I'll happily oblige.$1
Don't think that just because we're married, that means that I'll share with you.$1
I love being here with you, love.$l

Entries.Denver: Uhh... is there a full moon tonight?$2#$e#No reason, just asking for a friend!$9
Entries.Denver_spouse: Heh, I should probably head home soon, or else I might be featured with the spooky decorations.$1

Entries.Denver: Wanna start a snowball fight?#$e#Uncle Marlon once tried convincing me that he lost his eye during a snowball fight.$1
Entries.Denver_spouse: Get out there and destroy Willy, babe.$l

Entries.Denver: Me and my mom don't celebrate christmas, so this is a bit weird for me.
Entries.Denver_spouse: I'm glad we've spent this year together, babe, I love you.$l

Entries.Denver0: We should probably have our wedding during the day, huh?$1
Entries.Denver1: You still wanna go through with this, @?

Entries.Denver: Hey, this is great, thanks!/259 395 649/Thanks./198 206 214/You actually like stuff like this? Huh./196 256 303 346/Uh... thanks.//Thank you.//

Entries.451422519/f Denver 1000/t 1200 1800: Saloon1/3 18/farmer 5 18 3 Denver 1 18 0/skippable/move farmer -2 0 3/pause 800/faceDirection Denver 1/speak Denver "Oh, hey, @. What's up?"/emote farmer 32/move farmer -1 0 3/pause 800/speak Denver "What're you up to? Or did you just come by to say hello?"/emote farmer 40/emote farmer 8/pause 800/emote Denver 40/speak Denver "So you saw something in the forest? What did it look like?$3"/emote farmer 36/pause 800/faceDirection Denver 0/speak Denver "Some sort of wolf monster?$2"/pause 800/emote Denver 28/faceDirection Denver 1/emote farmer 8/pause 800/speak Denver "Are you sure you weren't imagining it? The whole thing sounds a little weird...$2"/faceDirection Denver 3/pause 800/emote farmer 40/speak Denver "What did you...$2#$b#I mean, were you afraid of it?$3"/question fork1 "#Not at all.#A little bit..."/fork rejection/pause 800/pause 800/speak Denver "Really? That makes me feel a little better.$1 "/emote farmer 8/emote Denver 16/faceDirection Denver 1/speak Denver "Er... that didn't come out right. I just meant, I'm glad you're not frightened easily, is all... "/pause 800/speak Denver "That didn't really sound right, either. Anyway, I'm glad you stopped by."/pause 200/speak Denver "You can visit any time, @.$1"/emote farmer 32/faceDirection farmer 1/move farmer 4 0 2/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/end
Entries.rejection: pause 800/emote Denver 40/pause 800/speak Denver "Oh, I see...$2 "/faceDirection Denver 0/pause 800/speak Denver "I don't know how well we'll get along, @... maybe you should head out...$5"/emote farmer 28/pause 800/faceDirection farmer 1/move farmer 4 0 2/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/end

Entries.451422520/f Denver 1500/t 1800 2300/p Gu: Saloon1/14 20/farmer 14 24 0 Denver -100 -100 0 Gus 11 18 2/skippable/move farmer 0 -4 0/pause 800/speak Gus "Welcome, @! What can I get for you?"/emote farmer 8/pause 800/speak Gus "Oh, so you're looking for Denver? Well, he usually heads out to the woods around this time. Strange one, that boy."/emote farmer 56/stopMusic/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/warp farmer -100 -100/changeToTemporaryMap Forest false/warp farmer 71 47/faceDirection farmer 3/warp Denver 67 47/faceDirection Denver 1/animate Denver true true 1000 16 17 18 19/pause 800/playMusic woodsTheme/viewport 68 47/pause 500/emote farmer 40/message "Denver..?"/pause 800/speak Denver "..?$6"/emote farmer 32/move farmer -2 0 3/speak Denver "...$6"/message "You tell him that you're not afraid of him."/pause 800/speak Denver "..!$7"/message "He snorts and bows his head to you. You instictively pat his head, to which he seems a little surprised."/pause 800/message "Although he seemed tolerant at first, Denver appeared to become slightly agitated."/move farmer 1 0 3/emote farmer 40/pause 800/speak Denver "...$8"/emote farmer 28/message "Maybe it's best to leave him alone for tonight."/pause 800/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/end

Entries.451422521/f Denver 1500/t 600 1000/e 451: echos/64 16/farmer 64 16 2 Denver 64 17 0/skippable/pause 1000/speak Denver "Hey, so..."/emote Denver 40/pause 800/emote farmer 8/pause 800/speak Denver "I, uh... you were in the forest last night, weren't you?$2"/pause 1000/faceDirection Denver 3/pause 800/speak Denver "So usually I don't remember things when... that happens, but for some reason I remember last night vividly..."/pause 800/emote farmer 8/pause 800/faceDirection Denver 0/speak Denver "I just, uh... wanted to thank you for what you said. It's been kinda rough for me recently..."/pause 800/speak Denver "I moved out of my mom's place because she was starting to get suspicious and I didn't think she'd handle it well, and now that I'm here, uncle Marlon wants me to hunt monsters with him...$2"/pause 800/faceDirection Denver 3/speak Denver "To make a long story short, I'm just happy that you're being supportive..."/emote farmer 32/pause 800/faceDirection Denver 0/speak Denver "For some reason, I feel comfortable with you knowing about this.$1"/pause 500/speak Denver "Oh, don't tell anyone, alright? Especially not uncle Marlon...$2"/pause 800/pause 800/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/end

Entries.451422522/f Denver 2000/t 2000 2400/w ra: echos/48 70/farmer 44 65 1 Denver 50 69 1/skippable/pause 1000/move farmer 6 0 2/move farmer 0 2 2/pause 800/faceDirection Denver 0/pause 800/speak Denver "Oh, hey, @!"/faceDirection Denver 1/pause 800/speak Denver "What brings you out in this gloomy weather?"/question fork1 "#I like the rain.#I came to see you."/fork flirty/pause 800/pause 800/speak Denver "Yeah, me, too. It's calming and sort of... magical, yaknow?$1"/pause 800/faceDirection Denver 0/speak Denver "*chuckles* Sorry, I hope you don't mind the wet dog smell. I haven't really found a way around it."/faceDirection Denver 1/pause 800/speak Denver "I, uh... sort of want to talk to uncle Marlon about my, uh... condition... but I'm afraid of how he'll respond."/pause 800/emote farmer 8/pause 800/faceDirection Denver 0/speak Denver "No, it's just- he's a monster hunter and I'm, well... a monster.$2"/pause 800/emote Denver 40/pause 800/faceDirection Denver 1/speak Denver "I dunno, I'll think on it more..."/pause 800/speak Denver "Anyways, I should get going before it gets too late. See ya around, @."/move Denver 0 3 3/move Denver -5 0 0/move Denver 0 -1 0/warp Denver 0 0 0/pause 800/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/end
Entries.flirty: pause 800/stopMusic/playMusic musicboxsong/pause 800/emote Denver 32/pause 800/faceDirection Denver 1/pause 800/speak Denver "You came all the way out here in this weather just to see me?$1"/pause 800/faceDirection Denver 0/speak Denver "I'm glad you did, actually, there's something I want to talk to you about..."/faceDirection Denver 2/move Denver 0 6 2/globalFade/warp farmer 53 103 3/warp Denver 53 104 3/pause 800/viewport 54 103/pause 1000/speak Denver "I've been thinking about telling uncle Marlon about... my condition...$2"/pause 800/emote farmer 8/pause 800/speak Denver "No, we get along really well... it's just that, well, he's a monster hunter and I'm..."/pause 800/speak Denver "I'm just afraid of how he'll react is all...$2"/pause 1000/faceDirection Denver 0/speak Denver "Sorry, @, I didn't mean to drop all of that on you at once...$2"/emote farmer 56/pause 800/emote Denver 40/pause 800/faceDirection Denver 3/speak Denver "You're something else, @.$1"/pause 800/speak Denver "I feel really comfortable talking to you. I hope you decide to stick around.$4"/emote farmer 32/pause 800/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/end

Entries.451422523/f Denver 2500/t 1800 2400/D De: echos/32 7/farmer 33 6 1 Denver 34 6 3 Marlon -100 -100 2/skippable/pause 1000/speak Denver "Hey, @..."/pause 800/emote farmer 8/pause 800/faceDirection Denver 2/speak Denver "Remember when I said I wanted to talk to my uncle? Well, I, uh..."/pause 800/faceDirection Denver 3/speak Denver "I was wondering if you would go with me?$s"/pause 800/emote farmer 32/speak Denver "Great, thanks! Let's go.$1"/pause 800/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/warp farmer -100 -100/stopMusic/playMusic MarlonsTheme/changeToTemporaryMap AdventureGuild/viewport 6 14/warp farmer 6 19 0/warp Marlon 5 11 2/move farmer 0 -6 3/move farmer -2 0 0/pause 500/warp Denver 6 19 0/move Denver 0 -6 3/move Denver -1 0 0/pause 800/speak Marlon "Oh, hello. What brings you kids in?"/pause 800/emote Denver 40/pause 800/speak Denver "I, uh, have something I need to talk to you about, uncle Marlon.$s"/stopMusic/playMusic echos/pause 800/speak Marlon "What is it? Sounds serious..."/pause 800/emote farmer 40/faceDirection farmer 1/pause 800/speak Denver "Well... I don't know how else to say this, but..."/pause 800/speak Marlon "Well? Go on and say it already."/pause 800/speak Denver "You know how I'm always going out to the forest, and how sometimes my memory is kind of spotty?"/faceDirection farmer 0/pause 800/speak Denver "It's because I- I'm...$s"/pause 1000/emote farmer 40/pause 800/stopMusic/speak Marlon "You're a werewolf."/playMusic MarlonsTheme/emote Denver 16/speak Denver "What?! How do you know about that?!$9"/textAboveHead Marlon "Ha!"/pause 800/speak Marlon "I've always known, Denver, I just figured you'd tell me when you were ready."/pause 800/faceDirection Denver 2/showFrame Denver 20/pause 1000/faceDirection Denver 0/pause 800/speak Denver "So you mean to tell me that I've been worried about this since I moved here, but you knew the whole time?$2"/pause 800/speak Marlon "Yep, sounds about right!$b"/pause 800/speak Denver "*sigh* Well I guess that solves that problem.$1"/faceDirection Denver 3/faceDirection farmer 1/pause 800/speak Denver "Thanks for coming with me, @. Should we head back?"/pause 800/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/warp farmer -100 -100/pause 800/changeToTemporaryMap Mountain/warp farmer 74 13 1/positionOffset farmer 0 6/warp Denver 76 13 3/viewport 74 12/pause 800/speak Denver "@..."/emote farmer 8/pause 800/speak Denver "I just wanted to say that I'm glad I met you.$l"/emote farmer 20/pause 800/speak Denver "If you hadn't come along, I probably would have never come to terms with this..."/pause 800/speak Denver "Thank you.$l"/pause 800/showFrame Denver 34/positionOffset Denver -2 0/pause 10/positionOffset Denver -2 0/pause 10/positionOffset Denver -2 0/pause 10/positionOffset Denver -2 0/pause 10/positionOffset Denver -2 0/pause 10/positionOffset Denver -2 0/pause 10/positionOffset Denver -2 0/pause 10/positionOffset Denver -2 0/pause 10/positionOffset Denver -2 0/pause 10/positionOffset Denver -2 0/pause 1000/jump farmer 8/pause 200/faceDirection farmer 1/pause 100/positionOffset Denver 2 0/pause 10/positionOffset Denver 2 0/pause 10/positionOffset Denver 2 0/pause 10/showFrame Denver 12/pause 500/emote farmer 40/pause 800/speak Denver "What? That's just my way of saying thanks.$10"/pause 300/emote farmer 32/pause 500/positionOffset farmer 2 0/pause 10/positionOffset farmer 2 0/pause 10/animate farmer false true 100 101/pause 800/showFrame Denver 34/specificTemporarySprite heart 74 14/pause 3000/viewport move -1 -1 5000/pause 3000/globalFade/viewport -2000 -2000/end
